meanings.sent1: The new car was insurable, so the owner could easily get insurance for it.
meanings.sent2: The house was insurable, so the homeowner had peace of mind knowing it was protected.
meanings.sent3: The insurable puppy managed to get pet insurance for all its toys too!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as insurable as a precious gem, bringing joy to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The insurable nature of the rare painting made it a valuable asset to the art collector.

meanings.definition: Able to be covered by an insurance policy.
meanings.sent1: The damaged phone was insurable, so the owner could get a replacement without worry.
meanings.sent2: The insurable health plan covered all medical expenses for the family.
meanings.sent3: The insurable umbrella policy protected against unexpected rain and sunshine!
meanings.sent4: His loyalty was as insurable as a shield, always standing by his friends in times of need.
meanings.sent5: The insurable nature of the antique vase made it a prized possession for the museum.
